remarks: Substitution applied to an atomic wff (class version of ~ elsb3 ). (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 28-Apr-2010.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jun-2011.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Mar-2017.)
statement:
clelsb3f.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
clelsb3f $p |- ( [ x / y ] y e. A <-> x e. A ) $.
